Sentencas: On-line control and optimization can improve the efficiency of fuel cell systems, whilst simultaneously ensuring that the operation remains within a safe region.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: Also, fuel cells are subject to frequent variations in their power demand.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: This paper investigates the real-time optimization (RTO) of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: An optimization problem maximizing the efficiency subject to operating constraints is defined.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: Due to inevitable model inaccuracies, the open-loop implementation of optimal inputs evaluated off-line may be suboptimal, or worse, infeasible.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: Infeasibility can be avoided by controlling the constrained quantities.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: However, the constraints that determine optimal operation might switch with varying power demand, thus requiring a change in the regulator structure.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: In this paper, a control strategy that can handle plant-model mismatch and changing constraints in the face of varying power demand is presented and illustrated.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The strategy consists in the integration of RTO and model predictive control (MPC).
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: A lumped model of the SOFC is utilized at the RTO level.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The measurements are not used to re-estimate the parameters of the SOFC model at different operating points, but to simply adapt the constraints in the optimization problem.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: The optimal solution generated by RTO is implemented using MPC that uses a step-response model in this case.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack

Sentencas: Simulation results show that near-optimality can be obtained, and constraints are respected despite model inaccuracies and large variations in the power demand.
Titulo: Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack
Robust Real-Time Optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack
